name: The Lost Relic (Metalstorm)
description:
After searching for a lost relic you have discovered a mysterious monster was contained within. You must search through his randomly generated dungeon to find his room and then destroy the Boss of the dungeon Hapexamendios.

You really want to stay up on your health so a big tip is to get as many health pickups as you can to keep your health as high as possible.

This is my submission for the second GameDev.TV Game jam and was done solely by myself. The only Credit given outside of myself is to Google Fonts for providing the font used in the game. All other assets including the music and sound effects were created by MetalStorm.

This game is in the style of a twin stick shooter/Bullet-Hell but due to being played in a web browser the controls have been changed to use WASD on the keyboard for movement and your mouse cursor will be the direction you shoot when you press left click.

You can either play the game in the browser or download the source Unity project and run it inside of Unity.
